SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU WHERE del_flg='N'
and menu_nm like '%'||#{menu_nm_key}||'%'
and active_flg=#{active_key}
ORDER BY menu_cd DESC

SELECT m.menu_cd ,m.menu_nm ,m.menu_url ,m.menu_level ,m.up_menu_cd ,( SELECT DISTINCT menu_nm FROM TB_menu WHERE m.up_menu_cd = menu_cd ) as up_menu_nm ,m.active_flg FROM TB_MENU m WHERE menu_cd = #{menu_cd} AND del_flg = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, m.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_cd ,m.menu_nm ,m.menu_url ,( SELECT DISTINCT menu_nm FROM TB_menu WHERE m.up_menu_cd = menu_cd ) as up_menu_nm FROM TB_MENU m WHERE m.del_flg='N' and m.active_flg='Y'
and m.menu_nm like '%'||#{menu_nm_key}||'%'
ORDER BY m.menu_cd DESC ) m )
WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT m.menu_cd ,m.menu_nm ,m.menu_url ,m.up_menu_cd ,m.menu_level ,m.active_flg FROM TB_MENU m, ( select auth_id, menu_cd, menu_acc_auth from tb_menu_auth where auth_id = ( select auth_id from tb_user_auth where user_id = #{sessionId} and active_flg = 'Y')) a WHERE m.menu_cd = a.menu_cd(+) and del_flg='N' and a.menu_acc_auth = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR m.menu_cd = m.up_menu_cd START WITH m.up_menu_cd is null
